title: Load Property Listings Within 3 Seconds
description: Verify that the initial loading of property listings on the public portal homepage completes within 3 seconds to ensure responsive user experience.

steps.description: Navigate to the portal homepage
Measure and verify that the property listings are fully loaded within 3 seconds

title: Advanced Search Returns Accurate Results
description: Test the advanced search system including multiple filters, location-based search, and map integration to verify relevant and accurate property listings are returned.

steps.description: Navigate to the advanced search page
Enter search criteria using multiple filters such as price range, property type, number of bedrooms, and location
Use interactive map to select a location area
Submit the search
Verify that the search results match the entered criteria and the map displays corresponding properties accurately

title: AI Generated Titles and Descriptions Produce Contextual Content
description: Ensure AI-generated property titles and descriptions are relevant, contextually accurate, and enhance the property publication process.

steps.description: Start the property publication multi-step form
Enter basic property data and invoke AI generation for title and description
Verify that generated titles and descriptions are contextually relevant and appropriate to the property details provided

title: Admin Authentication with Role-Based Access Control
description: Verify that administrative login process is secure, supports role-based access, and protects access to sensitive dashboard features.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login page
Enter valid credentials for admin and non-admin roles
Confirm successful login and display of role-specific dashboard elements
Attempt to access admin features with a non-admin account
Verify access is denied or restricted appropriately
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Verify login failure and appropriate error message

title: Reject Upload of Unsupported Media Formats or Oversize Files
description: Validate media upload feature rejects unsupported file formats and files exceeding size limits for images and videos during property publication.

steps.description: Start property publication media upload step
Attempt to upload media files with unsupported formats (e.g., .exe, .txt)
Verify the system rejects unsupported file formats with clear error notifications
Attempt to upload media files exceeding the size limit
Verify file upload is rejected with relevant size limit error message

title: Geolocation and Map Features Display Correct Coordinates
description: Test geolocation detection and Google Maps API integration to ensure user location and searched properties are accurately displayed.

steps.description: Allow portal access to geolocation permissions
Verify detected user coordinates match actual location and are displayed on map
Search for properties near the detected location
Confirm map updates to show properties in the searched area correctly
Simulate geolocation errors (e.g., denied permission, timeout)
Verify appropriate error modals are shown and graceful fallback occurs

title: Multi-Language Support Switches UI Text and Content Correctly
description: Verify that the portal supports switching among Portuguese, English, and Spanish languages with all UI text and content updated accordingly.

steps.description: Access language selection control
Switch language to Portuguese
Verify that all visible UI text and content are displayed in Portuguese
Switch language to English
Verify that all visible UI text and content are displayed in English
Switch language to Spanish
Verify that all visible UI text and content are displayed in Spanish

title: Accessibility Compliance with Keyboard Navigation and Screen Reader Support
description: Confirm that all major UI components can be navigated by keyboard, are readable by screen readers, and satisfy color contrast standards.

steps.description: Use keyboard to navigate through homepage, search, property listings, and publication forms
Verify logical tab order, focus states visible, and all interactive elements reachable
Use common screen reader tools to read UI content on various pages
Confirm correct semantic structure, labels, and meaningful content read out
Use accessibility tools to verify color contrast ratios meet standards
Color contrasts of texts, buttons, and icons meet accessibility guidelines

title: Session Persistence and Encrypted Passwords with HTTPS Communication
description: Verify secure login sessions persist correctly, passwords are encrypted with bcrypt, and all communications occur over HTTPS.

steps.description: Login as user or admin with valid credentials on HTTPS
Confirm login session persists after page reload and across browser tabs
Intercept network traffic during login and data exchange
Verify all communication is encrypted over HTTPS
Check password storage in Supabase backend with bcrypt encryption
Confirm passwords are not stored in plain text and use recommended hashing

title: Complete Property Publication Journey with All Validations
description: Test the end-to-end property publication flow, including multi-step form completions, AI generated content, media uploads, validations, and successful submission.

steps.description: Navigate to property publication section as publisher
Fill in each step of the multi-step form with valid and invalid data to trigger validations
Verify validation messages appear correctly for missing or invalid inputs
Use AI assistance to generate property title and description
Verify AI-generated fields populate correctly and can be edited
Upload valid images and videos and complete media validation
Verify media uploads succeed and are optimized for storage
Submit the final publication form
Confirm successful listing creation and visibility on public portal

title: Admin Property Management Filters and Sorting
description: Verify the admin dashboard property management feature supports filters, sorting, and batch actions for effective property handling.

steps.description: Login to admin dashboard
Navigate to property management section
Apply filters such as property status, publication date, and agent assignment
Verify filtered properties match criteria
Sort property listings by date, price, or status
Confirm sorting order is correctly applied
Perform batch actions like publish, unpublish, or delete on selected properties
Ensure actions are processed and UI updates accordingly

title: UI Components Render Correctly with Responsive Layout
description: Test that key UI components including modals, forms, navigation headers, and icons render correctly and adapt to various screen sizes.

steps.description: Navigate through portal pages on desktop, tablet, and mobile resolutions
Verify UI components render correctly without layout breaks or overlapping elements
Check modal dialogs open and close as expected and are properly sized on different screens
Validate that icons display correctly and convey intended meaning

title: Address Autocomplete Handles Invalid or Partial Inputs Gracefully
description: Test the Google Maps API based address autocomplete feature for correct suggestions and error handling on partial, invalid, and special character inputs.

steps.description: Focus on address input fields in search and publication forms
Enter partial, incomplete, or invalid address queries
Verify autocomplete suggestions update appropriately or display no results message
Enter address inputs containing special characters or unexpected formats
Confirm system handles these inputs gracefully without crashing or erroneous behavior

title: Published Property Details Display All Relevant Information
description: Verify the detailed property pages display all published information including galleries, descriptions, features, agent contact, and maps.

steps.description: Select a published property from listings or search results
Verify presence of property image and video gallery with navigation controls
Ensure property title, description, features, and price details match published data
Check agent contact information is visible and contains correct data
Confirm embedded Google Map shows exact property location

title: User Login Session Persists and Logout Clears Session
description: Confirm that user login session is persistent across page reloads and browser restarts, and logout clears all session data correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user with valid credentials
Verify session is established and user is redirected appropriately
Refresh the browser and verify user remains logged in
Close and reopen the browser and verify session persistence if designed to persist
Perform logout action
Confirm session is destroyed and user is redirected to login or homepage with no access to secure pages
